ComicInfo.Title: The Russian Shift Part 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
"THE RUSSIA SHIFT," Part Three
Whoever thought two dead bums could be such a pain in the ass? Now even the Mayor's office is under scrutiny, but even an old Muscovite like Klem Ristovych knows that's a whole new bag of hurt to be poking. And why the hell is Ralph researching terrorist groups?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Antony Johnston & Justin Greenwood | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Jamie McKelvie | 2 |
ComicInfo.Characters: Klementina Ristovych,Ralph Karl Dietrich,Curtis Birch,Layla Goodman
